short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll up/down 10 times to enable DJ record scratch 'EraEra' noise! Spacebar for airhorn. Resets after 1 second of inactivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll back and forth 10 times on your trackpad/mouse wheel to enable the DJ record scratch 'EraEra' noise. Hold shift for constant 'down' scratch. Press space for airhorn. Stop scrolling for 1 second to return to normal scrolling.
